biography: Eero is a golfer known for his meticulous approach to the game and his thoughtful demeanor on the course. While details about his home club remain private, his presence has been noted in golfing circles for his strategic play.

Although Eero has participated in the Hector Trophée once, he is currently considered retired from Hector events. Despite not securing a Victor trophy or a Hector Trophée win in the past, his contribution to the competitive spirit of the tournament has been appreciated. His absence from the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 is noted, though the possibility of a return is always open.
